thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: neuroNadia
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by neuroNadia

author: neuroNadia
title: neuroNadia
text: This site is so streamlined and easy-to-use. Many ways to pay too. Been a customer for a while now, and today was my first time experiencing a technical glitch. I saw they had a section just for my issue, and I submitted a ticket, which was very straightforward. I figured I would have to wait at least 24 hours until I got a reply, but it was honestly handled in like 20 mins, and the problem was solved. I am so impressed. I am a connoisseur of online shopping and have dealt with many e-commerce sites, but this site is one of the best.
